biotools.summary: TSSpredator, a Java program for the automated detection and classification of TSS from RNA-seq data. TSSpredator reads RNA-seq data in the form of simple wiggle files and performs a genome wide comparative prediction of TSS, for example between different growth conditions.

bioschemas.name: TSSpredator
